DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the frequency of postoperative complications depending on the number of suture layers in colo-colonic and ileo-colonic anastomoses Hypothesis: double-layer suture has less anastomotic leakages compared to single-layer suture.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Comparing Two Established Gastrointestinal Suture Techniques - One-layer-continuous Versus Double-layer-continuous Suture
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years old, planned for elective surgery at least one handsutured ileocolonic or colocolonic anastomosis ASAScore > 3, missing written consent of the informed patient no existing choice between suturetechniques according to the surgeon patient not able to cooperate/noncompliance rectal anastomoses
DOC.keyword: Hand-sutured colo-colonic and ileo-colonic anastomoses in elective surgery
